amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 115-785 to increase funding for the training and retention of cybersecurity professionals under the Defense-Wide Operation and Maintenance Account by $5,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rosen amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Ms. Rosen.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rosen amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
